Package.Name: Support
Package.License: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, November 2007
Package.ChangeLog: Fixed bug#5369 - Support Module fails on Oracle databases.
Added new check to compare the application and DB servers timestamp.
Fixed bug with check.xml files containing no information.
Fixed bug# 4992 - Support package 1.0.96 and 1.0.97 not working on OTRS 2.1.9.
Fixed error message in log about missing cron check.
Made it possible to enable/disable each check via sysconfig.
Fixed some performance issues of tar files with OTRS 2.4 (support package took 100% cpu time up to 30 min.).
Added some debug info to fnd out where a support package stop the process and added max file count protection of application archive file.
Added new checks for root@otrs password and SOAP, improved Win32 version detection, improved PostgreSQL version detection, fixed typos.
Improved DirectoryFiles() to exclude TempDir und ArticleDir based on current config setting (prevent possible Mail Bomb mail rejects).
Init release for OTRS 2.4. Add new Encode handling.
Package.Description: Verifies System settings and gives performance tips.
Das Support Assessment Modul prüft fehlerhafte System-Einstellungen und gibt Performance-Tips.
